p: With regard to the chemical composition of the fruit essential oils, the PCA and clustering results revealed the formation of four distinctly separated clusters. Each cluster was constituted of samples from the first and second harvest periods. The samples from April in the first harvest and February in the second harvest presented a similarity in constituent distribution and formed the cluster 1 (D1) ( Figure 4c). The presence of samples from the same month, but not the same period, were found in clusters 2 (D2), 3 (D3), and 4 (D4).
